name: Patchwork Kingdom #590 | Rilquilar
description: Rilquilar is a rare instance of an entire kingdom where none of the 167 schools are connected to the internet (and 20 schools with unavailable data as stars in the sky) | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
